Reconnue dans ce petit village du Camero: Recognized in this small village of Cameroon as one of the best cooks, KEUNI knew how to combine local spices, conferring that special taste to her dishes. The secret of our great grandmother’s tasty spice combinations was transmitted from mothers to daughters. Her recipes were the source of my inspiration when creating “SECRET” spices. «SECRET» spices is above all, the opportunity to honor this great lady who transmitted to my mother, my aunts, my cousins and myself this pas- sion for cooking and more specifically, for spices.
Nos sauces réussissent à allier le piqua: Our sauces thus succeeded in combining the spiciness of the Penja white pepper and the gentleness of njanssang (one of the star spices of the continent) in order to create an explosion of flavors, bringing out the delicately woody and musky aromas of this fine pepper
« SECRET » se décline en 3 recettes : Sa: SECRET exits in 3 recipes: chicken sauce, meat sauce and fish sauce. 3 sauces that will help you travel through the mother continent while you will be pre- paring your dishes
